subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony finished with 29 points and 13 rebounds, and Kevin Seraphin scored 12 off the bench, in a 95-87 victory against the Pelicans.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony finished with 29 points and 13 rebounds, and Kevin Seraphin scored 12 off the bench, in a 95-87 victory against the Pelicans.
